mapper.delete: delete from backuplog where archiveDate < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{saveMonth} MONTH)
mapper.select: select a.`url`,a.`archiveDate`,a.`createtime` from backuplog a where a.`archiveDate` = #{archiveDate}

select a.`url`,a.`archiveDate`,a.`createtime` from backuplog a
and date_format(a.archiveDate,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.archiveDate < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{saveMonth} MONTH)
order by archiveDate desc limit #{startLine},#{endLine}

select count(*) from backuplog a
and date_format(a.archiveDate,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.archiveDate < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{saveMonth} MONTH)
